name: Pix2Vox-F Tensorflow
description: Pix2Vox-F TensorFlow is a conversion of the Pix2Vox-F model from PyTorch to TensorFlow. The model includes an encoder, decoder, and context-aware fusion model in order to generate a voxel volume from images.

name: NeRF 101
description: NeRF 101 is the detailed documentation that records the process of training NeRF (neural radiance field) models synthetically generated Blender data.

name: Voxel Carving
description: Voxel Carving is a 3D reconstruction project that converts images of an object (taken from different camera views) and creates a 3D representation.

name: D@B
description: D@B (Dorms at Brown) is a site designed to give Brown students access to information about each dorm on campus (pictures, features, reviews, etc) in order to help them make decisions during the housing process.

name: Under the Sea
description: Under the Sea is a project the displays an underwater scene incorporating features such as procedurally generated terrain, corals, and camera movement along bezier curves.
